## Strait of Georgia Survey 2022-049 CTD Station Map

This is a quick sample R Markdown document created by Johan showing the map of CTD station in 2022 for Strait of Georgia Program. Leaflet package is used to map the stations.

```{r}
library(leaflet)
file.ctd <- "SMI2021-049-CTD.csv"
ctd <- read.csv(file.ctd)
sogm <- leaflet() %>%
  setView(lat = 49.3, lng = -124.0, zoom = 8) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(lat = ctd$LAT, lng = ctd$LNG, radius = 2)
sogm
```
